_source.text: After her arrest and a three-hour trial, a Cook County, Ill., jury found her insane, and an arrest warrant was issued to have her taken to Bellevue Place in Batavia, an asylum for those who could afford better than the state hospital.

text: After her arrest and a three-hour trial, a Cook County, Ill., jury found her insane, and an arrest warrant was issued to have her taken to Bellevue Place in Batavia, an asylum for those who could afford **better** **than** the **state** **hospital**.
